summary: Sprint 9 Frontend Wiring Verification Complete. All 7 features tested and PASSED. Backend APIs returning real YouTube data. Frontend pages (Overview, ROI Center, FVS System) successfully wired to /api/analytics/* and /api/trends/* endpoints.

minor.issue: Multiple 'width(-1) and height(-1)' warnings in Analytics page during initial render. Charts display correctly after render. Known Recharts library timing issue.
Returns 0 because YouTube Analytics API requires channel monetization (YPP). Using Data API fallback. Expected behavior per test request notes.

passed_tests: 1. Overview page shows real YouTube stats: Subscribers=1,320, Total Views=116,803, Videos=73 ✓
2. Overview page shows Best Performing Short with thumbnail and view count ✓
3. FVS System page displays AI Recommendations from /api/trends/recommendations (3 recommendations visible) ✓
4. FVS System page displays Competitor Videos from /api/trends/competitors (10 videos from Vayak Nazariya etc) ✓
5. Scan Trends button triggers /api/trends/scan endpoint (shows 'Trend scan started' toast and 'Scanning...' state) ✓
6. Analytics page shows real YouTube data with Sync Analytics button (teal, top-right) ✓
7. ROI Center page shows appropriate empty state 'Not enough data yet to compute ROI' when no episodes published ✓
8. Backend pytest: 25/25 tests passed (analytics overview, videos, sync, chart-data, top-performers, trends scan/status/recommendations/competitors) ✓
seed_data_creation: Real YouTube data from Chanakya Sutra channel via OAuth. 73 videos synced.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sprint 9 frontend wiring complete. All pages (Overview, ROI Center, FVS System) consuming real YouTube Analytics and Trend Intelligence data. Watch Time/CTR show 0 due to YPP requirement (expected). Trend scan working with Gemini 2.0 Flash generating recommendations.
